nodes.text: Nok Drayen's father was a male Human, who was the son of Arak Drayen III, the King of Dubrillion, who was overthrown and killed in 3749 BBY. The son of the king went into exile and eventually had a son of his own, Nok Drayen. Before his death, he taught Nok the code required to unlock the container with the Crown of Dubrillion, hidden in The Long Shadow.
Nok Drayen's father is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Smuggler mission on the planet Nar Shaddaa.
